rows.label: qst640409_msg0001
rows.name:
Wowee...
Now this is what I expect when it 
comes to hot springs!

rows.label: qst640409_msg0002
rows.name:
We are not appeased... This place is
not maintained at all! Where is the
landscaping? The facilities? The staff?

rows.label: qst640409_msg0003
rows.name:
What point is there to winning a
lifetime of free entry when it's
free to enter to begin with?!

rows.label: qst640409_msg0004
rows.name:
There, there, Linne. Lighten up!
We've walked all this way, might
as well try to enjoy ourselves.

rows.label: qst640409_msg0006
rows.name:
A banquet with our beautiful friends
in the hot spring! This day may yet
be salvaged!

rows.label: qst640409_msg0101
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, I've heard of this place.
The water here will do wonders for
your skin, believe me.

rows.label: qst640409_msg0102
rows.name:
Is that so? I'm looking forward to it...
To think, all this time in Superbia
and we've never once visited here.

rows.label: qst640409_msg0103
rows.name:
OK Seori, if you see any Peeping
Toms, you've gotta end them quickly.

rows.label: qst640409_msg0104
rows.name: They'll be dead before they can blink...

rows.label: qst640409_msg0105
rows.name:
It's all right, Kit and Sunny are happy
to keep watch! Aren't you, guys?

rows.label: qst640409_msg0106
rows.name:
I don't think I've ever had a banquet
in a hot spring before, but I bet it'll be
awesome fun!

rows.label: qst640409_msg0107
rows.name:
I know, right?
I'm already feeling happy!

rows.label: qst640409_msg0108
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]These filthy beasts are in the way
of our admiring our beloved
companions!!!

rows.label: qst640409_msg0109
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]We will not stand for thiiiiiis!!!
